mapper.select:
SELECT P.party_number , C.camp_name , P.party_title , M.member_nickname , P.party_start_date , P.party_end_date , P.party_size , P.party_write_time , C.camp_type_normal , C.camp_type_car , C.camp_type_caravan , C.camp_type_glamping FROM TB_PARTY AS P JOIN TB_MEMBER AS M ON P.member_number = M.member_number JOIN TB_CAMP AS C ON P.camp_number = C.camp_number
WHERE camp_type_normal != ''
WHERE camp_type_car != ''
WHERE camp_type_caravan != ''
WHERE camp_type_glamping != ''
ORDER BY P.party_write_time ASC , P.party_number DESC
ORDER BY P.party_write_time DESC , P.party_number DESC
ORDER BY P.party_start_date ASC , P.party_number DESC
ORDER BY P.party_start_date DESC , P.party_number DESC
ORDER BY P.party_end_date ASC , P.party_number DESC
ORDER BY P.party_end_date DESC , P.party_number DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PARTY (party_title, party_content, party_start_date, party_end_date, party_size, member_number, camp_number) VALUES (#{partyTitle},#{partyContent}, #{partyStartDate},#{partyEndDate}, #{partySize},#{memberNumber},#{campNumber})
